Detailed Description

This class is the terrain renderer class, it contains the methods for rendering the new terrain blocks.

bool Terrain::TerrainRenderer2::canSeeTerrain (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Method to find out if the terrain should be drawn or not.

Returns:
true if the terrain should be drawn, false otherwise.

Implements Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer.

void Terrain::TerrainRenderer2::clearBlocks (  )  [virtual]

This method clears all our cached blocks.

Usually this is done automatically in drawAll, however in some cases clear needs to be called explicitly (for example entity shadow casting detects shadows falling on outdoor terrain blocks and caches them, even if the terrain is not visible and the shadows won't be drawn.)

Implements Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer.

void Terrain::TerrainRenderer2::drawAll ( Moo::EffectMaterialPtr  pOverride = NULL,
bool  clearList = true 
) [virtual]

This method renders all our cached terrain blocks.

Parameters:
pOverride overridden material
clearList whether or not to erase the blocks from the render list

Implements Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer.

void Terrain::TerrainRenderer2::drawSingle ( BaseRenderTerrainBlock *  pBlock,
const Matrix &  transform,
Moo::EffectMaterialPtr  altMat = NULL,
bool  useCachedLighting = false 
) [virtual]

This function asks the renderer to immediately draw the terrain block.

The block is not added to the render list. The caller must maintain render context transform state. By default the cached lighting is not used - the caller must set lighting before call.

Parameters:
pBlock The block to render.
transform World transform for block.
altMat An alternative drawing material.
useCachedLighting Use cached lighting state or renderer lighting state. Used by Terrain2 only.

Implements Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer.
